 UC-Mexico Initiative 
 Call for Proposals:  Critical Mission Studies 
 The 2019 Call for Proposals from the Critical Mission Studies is open, see  call here .  Community members, tribal groups in the State of California are welcome to submit proposals; as well as UC researchers and students, both undergraduate and graduate.  There are two 2019 submission dates:  June 29 and December (date TBD).  Questions can be directed to Dr. Charlene Villaseñor Black,  cvblack@humnet.ucla.edu . 
 UC-UNAM-COMEXUS Short-Term Faculty Exchange Program: Energy Fellows 
 UNAM  and  COMEXUS  are collaborating to give  UC researchers  the opportunity to broaden and strengthen their research in the area of energy and to collaborate with UNAM researchers on energy-related topics. The duration of this short-term faculty exchange program ranges between a few weeks to a quarter. Applications for this program will be accepted at the start of every quarter. If you would like to learn more about the program or the application process, please  click here .
